name: SpaceX Pilot Trainer
description:
The game is about flying a rocket from the launch pad to the landing pad. You will have to collect items along the way to the landing pad. Without collecting all the items, you cannot move onto the next level. And avoid the obstacles. One hit and you're out. The level will restart. If in doubt, always move to the right.

The Controls are only 3 buttons.

Left Arrow Key - Tilt rocket to the left
Right Arrow Key - Tilt rocket to the right
Space bar - Thrust rocket up
